column4: ok people....im trying to do something simple......how do u install from a dvd?
same way you do it with a cd
you put the dvd in the drive, and boot
there is no dvd's that will allow that, you will need to get an alternate or server cd
shouldn't he be helping you then
maybe you just have a hosed install or something
should see the contents of your home folder
you should also be able, assuming you have gui, to go to system>administration>printing
putting my name and only my name on one line, is an abuse of !enter
collect your thoughts, and then ask a coherent question, don't put "I clicked printers" on a line
yes, burning isos is the easiest thing to do pretty much, you could do that on any of the burning programs
